fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Culture, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Directive 2014/26/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 February 2014 on collective management of copyright and related rights and multi-territorial licensing of rights in musical works for online use in the internal market Text with EEA relevance.
goals__remit:
Tribe of Noise is a global music company connecting musicians and business. We develop and exploit "all rights included" music services for commercial use and share our revenue with the participating Tribe members: DIY musicians from around the world owning 100% of their (copy) rights and entitled to represent themselves. 
 
Jan 2018: 30,000 members from 190+ countries.
